headline: INTERACTIVE INSTRUMENTS UNIVERSAL MATERIALS TESTER 1000 LB
description: Universal Materials Tester    Interactive Instruments Model 1K
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Tensile and Compression
categories.lvl2: Material / Physical Testing Equipment  >  Tensile and Compression > Electro Mechanical
specstable:
Manufacturer Interactive Inst
Model 1K
Load Frame Capacity 1,000.00 lb (4,448.57 N)
Distance Between Columns 13.00 in (33.02 cm)
Crosshead Travel 24.00 in (60.96 cm)
Controller

Waveform Generator supports ramp, trapezoid, sine, triangle, square, havercycle
LCD panel constantly displays load, stroke strain and cycle count in real time
Security key prevents unauthorized parameter changes
Load control accuracy < 0.1% FS (+/-1000 lbs.)
Stroke control accuracy < 0.005% FS (0 to 2.5")
PID control algorithm precisely maintains load, stroke or strain setpoint
Maximum platform response rate is adjustable from 0.00001 to 3.0 in/min

Load Cell Model: LPU1K Load Capacity: 1,000.00 lb (4,448.57 N)
Other Information

Load is measured via low profile Pancake (or optional S-beam) load cell
Load resolution: 0.1 lbs., Stroke resolution: 0.0001 in
Supports Load, Stroke and Strain control
2 internal amplifiers with external range and offset calibration adjustments
Analog data is converted using a 16 bit analog to digital converter (optional 12 bit)
Programmable digital filter ranges from 0.125 Hz to 16 Hz
Results are displayed in Metric or English units Remote operation and data collection using serial RS-232
All of Interactive Instruments systems and options have a one year warranty including Parts and Labor

Power Requirements 115 V 0.5 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition New-Never Used
Exterior Dimensions
Width 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Depth 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Height 42.000 in (106.7 cm)
Weight 65 lb (29 kg)
